column5: Beautifully appointed artistic loft located in Downtown & Deep Ellum districts.  1 block to train station  4 blocks to Arts district.  2 blocks to live music & restaurants. 25 minutes from DFW airport,  City center, parks, arts and culture are just steps away. access to major freeways just around the block.. You will immediately fall in love with this spacious loft. Consciously designed to nurture creativity and relaxation . Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Jewel in the heart of Dallas
